data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=zI2KAnjKQnoQ7kNvgEKU3aj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpoNYeNbb-I_wWCrDEToIm07j2dq4zGyovkHpON0lj8w&oe=6693B4B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AZtY89j6fWoQ7kNvgEd_Gck&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDG7of8HOybutsuPqjM6NDqHzfVKd52Hr6RieggznWaPg&oe=6693C252)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6QINIFycYFAQ7kNvgE-zUt4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBRM_NPLKyVdiaUgcBMPo_gaqxGCwJ9P0RCH2poRGA_LA&oe=6693AD89)
